body.text:
Thank you so much for the invitation—I’m genuinely excited about the opportunity to collaborate with your team. Your restaurant looks incredible, and I’d love to highlight it for my audience!




Due to the distance, travel and accommodation would be necessary for me to make the trip. If that’s something your team is open to providing, I’d be more than happy to move forward with a full content package and create an engaging experience for my followers that shines a spotlight on your amazing food and atmosphere.




Let me know your thoughts—I’d love to make this happen!




Best,

Fallah the Foodie

Thank you for your invitation.

If you are still interesting in inviting us, please let me know.

Attached is my media kit as a reference.
Thank you.
Grace

Hi Morgan, 
Thanks for reaching out. My name is Johanna and I manage all of Anivar’s brand collaborations. 

Anivar lives about 4 hours from Los Angeles, so we’ll need to compensate him for the day and travel in order to get him to location. 

Additionally if you’d like to guarantee any posts, being that this is his livelihood, we require a flat rate fair compensation. 

Let me know your offer and we can schedule something in the coming weeks. 

Looking forward to hearing back,

_________________________________

Johanna Rose (she/her)

Talent Management, President

Los Angeles, CA

@33ave
